revised_title: The Energy of Röntgen Rays: Elimination of Errors and Effect of Reflected Cathode Rays
tldr: The authors investigate the energy of Röntgen rays using various experimental methods and discuss the elimination of errors, such as unsteady discharge tube currents and potential gradients. They also explore the effect of reflected cathode rays on the results, finding that the energy of Röntgen rays is not significantly affected by this phenomenon.
